tasks.title: üèÄ Test: Check Atlanta Sports Today
tasks.description:
Search ESPN for Atlanta sports teams playing today and report back.

**Teams to check:**
- Atlanta Hawks (NBA)
- Atlanta Braves (MLB - in season)
- Atlanta Falcons (NFL - in season)
- Atlanta United (MLS - in season)
- Atlanta Dream (WNBA - in season)

**If teams playing:**
- List games with teams and times
- Mention channels if available

**If no games:**
- Send quick message: "No Atlanta teams playing today".

**Purpose:** Test Mission Control workflow.

comments.author: Molty
comments.text: Test task created via chat-first workflow.

tasks.title: üìÖ Daily: Extract Tasks from Calendar & Email
tasks.description:
Recurring task to pull actionable items from Google Calendar and emails into Mission Control.

**Schedule:**
- ‚è∞ 8am: Daily (via OpenClaw cron)
- üîç Scans next 36 hours
- üìã Creates tasks with auto-generated subtasks

**What gets extracted:**
- Google Calendar events (meetings, deadlines)
- Emails with task keywords (deadline, due, to-do)
- Meeting prep tasks
- Follow-up tasks

**Subtask generation:**
- For meetings: Prep agenda, attend, send notes
- For deadlines: Research, draft, finalize
- For tasks: Break into 2-3 actionable steps

comments.author: Molty
comments.text: Cron job created. Script needs Google Calendar & email MCP integration to work fully.

tasks.title: üîß Implement: Google Calendar & Email Task Extraction
tasks.description:
Build the full integration for the daily task extractor script.

**Requirements:**
- Connect Google Calendar via MCP (or API)
- Connect email via Zapier MCP or IMAP
- Parse events for next 36 hours
- Auto-generate subtasks based on task type
- Create Mission Control tasks via script

**MCP Tools Available:**
- Zapier MCP (90 tools, may include email)
- May need Google Calendar MCP server

**Deliverables:**
1. Working script that pulls calendar events
2. Working script that scans emails
3. Task creation logic with subtask generation
4. Testing with real data

**Note:** This is a one-time implementation task. Once complete, the daily extraction works automatically.

subtasks.title: Test Zapier MCP for email access

comments.author: Molty
comments.text: Created to track implementation needed for automatic task extraction.

activities.task: Daily: Extract Tasks from Calendar & Email
